title: Friends and other people
creator_credit: Centre for Study of Higher Education
brief_description: A teaching model used to educate the intellectually disabled about types of relationships, clarifying social norms and behavioural expectations,in order to deal with loneliness, low self esteem and vulnerability to exploitation. Includes a booklet by Susie Smith and Judi Gray.
